data.title: Is newly single Ryan back with Reese? Um, no - that's his daughter
data.meta_description: Today it's come out that Ryan Phillippe has split up with his girlfriend Abbie Cornish - the very lady he was accused of cheating on ex-wife Reese Witherspoon with - but, now that we've processed that information, we're far more interested in these super-cute pictures of him with the kids.
data.text:
Today it's come out that Ryan Phillippe has split up with his girlfriend Abbie Cornish - the very lady he was accused of cheating on ex-wife Reese Witherspoon with - but, now that we've processed that information, we're far more interested in these super-cute pictures of him with the kids.

First, there's the fact that son Deacon is dressed just like his dad. And then there's the fact that daughter Ava is now so much of a Reese doppelganger that we're sure she must have a screengrab from Legally Blonde as her Facebook profile picture.

We know it's hardly a revelation that kids sometimes look a bit like their parents, but the resemblance here is proper freaky - at first glance, we actually thought it was Reese, and were secretly hoping they were back together after all these years.

Honestly, it's almost like Ryan's trying to make everything look super-cute to distract us from the fact that his relationship has gone to shit, isn't it? We just hope he remembers that we're very much available - and great with kids...

Pics: Matrix
